sentences.english: When boiling vegetables, use enough water to cover them and keep the lid on the saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 煮菜时，用水将菜充实吞没，并将锅盖盖上。

sentences.english: Cover the pan with a clean dishtowel, replace the lid and allow to sit for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用一条干毛巾布代替锅盖复住锅口，放10分钟。

sentences.english: If they are still super-chewy, cover the pot again and simmer for up to another 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 如果嚼起来还是不太软嫩，就再盖上锅盖煮45分钟。

sentences.english: A sealing washer is provided inside the pot cover of the vacuum electric frying pan, exerting a sealing function.
sentences.chinese: 真空电炸锅的锅盖内有一个密封垫圈，起到密封作用。

sentences.english: There is also a story to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 锅盖面还有一段故事可言的。

sentences.english: The paper introduced a particular pneumatic control circuit to open and close the boiler lid.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了开闭蒸锅盖的一种特殊的气动控制回路。

sentences.english: The utility model is an electric cooker whose pot cover can flick smoothly, comprising a pot body, a pot cover and an axle.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型是一种锅盖能够平稳弹开的电饭煲。

sentences.english: The pot cover has applied double sealing.
Replace the pot lid and wait several minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把锅盖取下，然后静等几分钟。

sentences.english: Add the clams, mussels and white wine; cover the pan.
sentences.chinese: 加入蛤蜊，青口和白葡萄酒，盖上锅盖。

sentences.english: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until rice is almost tender, about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 将火调低，盖上锅盖，约15分钟直至米饭变软。

sentences.english: Uncover the pan and let the soup simmer. (v. )
sentences.chinese: 揭开锅盖，让汤再煨一下。

sentences.english: Cover with lid and shake the pan until the clams have opened.
sentences.chinese: 将锅盖盖好，并轻轻执起摇煮，直至蚬壳全部打开。

sentences.english: Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 把火转为小火，盖上锅盖，闷煮20分钟。

sentences.english: You've had a bowl haircut at one point in your life.
sentences.chinese: 你一生中理过至少一次锅盖头。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
